indicator_name: Framleiðsluvirðisauki sem hlutfall af vergri landsframleiðslu og á mann.
target: Stuðlað verði að sjálfbærri iðnþróun fyrir alla og eigi síðar en árið 2030 hafi hlutur iðnaðar í atvinnulífi og vergri landsframleiðslu aukist verulega í ljósi aðstæðna heima fyrir og tvöfaldast í þeim þróunarlöndum sem skemmst eru á veg komin.
graph_title: Framleiðsluvirðisauki sem hlutfall af vergri landsframleiðslu og á mann.

en.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 217 KB)
en.indicator_definition: Manufacturing value added (MVA) is the total value of goods and services net of intermediate consumption. It is generally compiled as the sum of the value added of all manufacturing activity units in operation in the reference period. It can be presented in percentage to gross domestic product (GDP) as well as per capita for any reference year. MVA growth rates are given at constant prices (in Chained Volume Measures [CVM]).
en.indicator_name: Manufacturing value added as a proportion of GDP and per capita
en.target: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries
en.graph_title: Manufacturing value added as a proportion of GDP and per capita
